## Part 1: Process the data

```{r}
library(readr)
buzzfeed <- read_csv("Stat 253 Mini Project 2/Stat-253-Mini-Project-2/buzzfeed.csv")
View(buzzfeed)

names(buzzfeed) <- c("title", "text", "url","authors","source","type" )
head(buzzfeed)

```

```{r}
library(tidytext)
library(dplyr)

tidy_buzzfeed<- buzzfeed%>%
  unnest_tokens(word, text)%>%
  count(word, sort = TRUE)

buzzfeed_sentiment <- tidy_buzzfeed %>%
  inner_join(get_sentiments("bing")) 
```
